explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions using machine learning techniques (KNN) to create a score for identifying students at risk of dropping out.
explanations.classification: The problem of identifying students at risk of dropping out is a classification problem, where students are classified into risk groups based on their performance.
explanations.KNN: The paper specifically mentions using the K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) algorithm as part of the machine learning approach to develop the dropout risk score.
